name: Dodge The Beat
description:
Dodge The Beat is a fast-paced action game, with simple controls. All you have to do is dodge...

How to play
  • Try to dodge and not to hit anything.
  • You have only one life, if you hit, it is game over.
Features
  • 7 Different awesome songs.
  • Every play attempt is unique.
  • 100% free game.
  • Runs even on old and low-end computers.
Controls
  • Move Left - a, left arrow
  • Move Right - d, right arrow
  • Double Movement Speed - left shift, right shift
  • Restart - R
